page.title: 02WILBERFOSS FOUR FARMS
page.content: {Average amount of land }139 acres {Types of farm}1 arable 1 dairy 2 mixed {Main crops}barley potatoes wheat {Main animal bred}dairycows beefcattle and pigs. {Chemicals used on crops}herbicides fungicides insecticides. {Type of land}sandy or light loam. {Problems}rising costs and selling prices falling. {Usage of fields}crop and animal rotation. None of the farmers have many helpers during the year apart from harvest times.The farmers say they dont have any trouble with dogs but only with the people that bring them for walks. All the farmers seemed quite content with the way the farms are run,apart from having no holidays.
